column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's fares the least favourite when it comes to the deep dish
column2: which is really confusing since a majority of its locations has numerous reviews. I had the personal pizza when I first tried the deep dish; it lacked overall flavour and was a really small size for a personal pizza. The second time I tried a larger deep dish with a group of friends and we all agreed that it lacked flavour and the crush had no taste at all. It seems as though the deep dish crusts in general have a lack lustre when it comes to taste
column3: perhaps something needs to be done! We also didn't like the bruschetta either for the general lack of flavour. After trying many different restaurants
column4: I don't know if I would have a deep dish here again. Although
column5: I am curious to try the regular pizza for comparisons.
